Postcode

MK

MK40

MK40 4

MK40 4RS lies on Wessex Close in Great Denham, Bedford. MK40 4RS is located in the Great Denham electoral ward, within the unitary authority of Bedford and the English Parliamentary constituency of North East Bedfordshire. The Sub Integrated Care Board (ICB) Location is NHS Bedfordshire, Luton and Milton Keynes ICB - M1J4Y and the police force is Bedfordshire. This postcode has been in use since August 2014.
